page.title: 04GREENALEIGH FARM.
page.content: AS AN ECONMIC PROPOSITION GREENALEIFH FARM IS NO LONGER VIABLE. THE OCCUPIER NOW RUNS A GLASS BLOWING BUSINESS THAT CATERS FOR THE TOURIST TRADE. HE MAKES ARTICLES IN GLASS THAT CAN EASILY BE TAKEN AWAY. e.g BELLS, VASES, JUGS. HIS WIFE RUNS AN OUTSIDE SNACK BAR WHERE VISITORS WHO ARE WALKING ON NORTH HILL CAN BUY MORNING COFFEE OR AFTERNOON TEA. THE FARM LAND IS STILL USED TO REAR BEEF CATTLE, SHEEP AND PIGS. POULTRY ROAM AT WILL, BUT THE FARM IS NO LONGER THE MAJOR SOURCE OF INCOME.
